full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 169 of 228 845 LC2Qmax5 - corrected Alessi - Direct house. She live with her boyfriend in Royal Palm Beach. Q. Who instructed you to pick Virginia up? A. Either Mr. Epstein or Ms. Maxwell. Q. Let's break that down. Did Ms. Maxwell ever instruct you to pick up Virginia Roberts? A. Yes. Q. Did Mr. Epstein ever instruct you to pick up Virginia Roberts? A. Yes, he did. Q. Who else, if anyone, did you see Virginia bring to Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach home? A. On one occasion, she bring her boyfriend and he came to the kitchen. However, I was told by Ms. Maxwell to get him out of the kitchen, and he has to wait in the car. Q. What, if any, females do you remember Virginia bringing to Mr. Epstein's Palm Beach house? A. At the end of my stay there, I saw her bringing two other girls. I even never saw their faces. They walk through the kitchen right away, and they went directly to Ms. Maxwell's desk. Q. When Virginia was at Mr. Epstein's Palm Beach home, who did you see her interact with? A. Ms. Maxwell and Mr. Epstein. Q. Did you ever see Virginia at Mr. Epstein's Palm Beach house with luggage? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018042
